meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Liz Fischer Chris Burke Alan Lin Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7522.

td.p: Liz Fischer, an attorney from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Chris Burke, a social studies teacher from Toms River, New Jersey
Alan Lin, a software engineer from Santa Barbara, California (whose 6-day cash winnings total $123,600)

tr.td: U.S. GEOGRAPHY
WRITERS ON FILM
AND SO IT GOES
WHAT ARE YOU MADE OF?
SCIENCE & NATURE
PUNNY KNIGHTS
(Alex: This is a different kind of category. I'll give you an example of something. "This knight is always giving up." "Who is Sir Render?")

Alan
